posts.post_content:
PENDING COMPLETION OF SALE--These 29 range from Fair-Good+, with a group discount, $565-- 
 
I'll sell them individually, with the common-backed commons ranging from $18-25.   
If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price. 
Discounts for multiple items and combined shipping. 

Email: [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [No pm's, please; my PM Box is often full].
Payment: Ppff djdoremus@msn. com [no messages]; thanks.
Regular paypal, add 3%.  Checks are okay, too.
